mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project(projectNo, title, content, deadline, targetFigure, memberNo) VALUES(SEQ_PRO.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{deadline}, #{targetFigure}, #{memberNo})
mapper.select: select p.*,tagname,projectsupportsum,id, fileurl from (select projectno, WM_CONCAT(tagname) tagname from hashtag h join tagrelation tl on h.tagno = tl.tagno group by projectNO) q join project p on q.projectNo=p.projectNo JOIN (select projectNO, sum(projectsupportsum) projectsupportsum from projectsupport group by projectno) sup on p.projectNo = sup.projectno join member m on p.memberNo = m.memberno join gcs g on p.projectNo = g.projectno
SELECT r.*,id FROM REPLY r JOIN MEMBER m on r.memberNo = m.memberNo WHERE r.projectNo = #{projectNo}
select p.*,id,fileurl from project p join member m on p.memberno=m.memberno join gcs g on p.projectno=g.projectno where p.projectno = #{projectNo}

select q.*,p.projectsupportsum from (select sum(projectsupportsum) projectsupportsum,p.projectno from project p join projectsupport ps on p.projectNo = ps.projectNo group by p.projectNo) p join (select targetfigure,deadline,postdate,projectno from project) q on p.projectNo = q.projectNo where p.projectno = #{projectNo} ORDER BY postdate DESC
